definitions.definition: An act of going out or going away, or leaving; a departure.
definitions.example: He made his exit at the opportune time.

definitions.definition: The act of departing from life; death.
definitions.example: the untimely exit of a respected politician

definitions.definition: To go out or go away from a place or situation; to depart, to leave.
To depart from life; to die.
To end or terminate (a program, subroutine, etc.)
(originally United States) To depart from or leave (a place or situation).
